title: I received a ward skin in a hextech box... never showed up as an option in game
body: Pretty sure its gone and nothing but can be done but hey, i can be hopeful that this is a known bug?

replies.body:
Hey there,

Have you checked your hextech loot?

> [{quoted}](name=SephirothSG,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=LTiEtEbg,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-02-11T10:22:41.140+0000)
>
> Hey there,
> 
> Have you checked your hextech loot?

i appreciate your response!

yes, i spent the required amount to make it activate and it said added!

Hey there,

Your best course of action in this case, if the item is still yet to appear in your account would be to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) directly to Player Support for further assistance.
